author: Matt Jancer
title: Google Nest Hub Max Review: A Good Companion
description: I lived for four months with this snappy Google Assistant-powered smart display and found it useful for everything from cooking instructions to home security.
content: It's not until I became cooped up inside my New York apartment (thanks, coronavirus) that I realized a smart display is not a terrible companion to have in the home. I've been talking to Google Assistant the past four months through Google's 10-inch smart dis… [+7720 chars]
